text: Wang Senhao () (born January 1933) is a People's Republic of China politician. He was born in Cixi City, Zhejiang. He joined the Communist Party of China in 1955. He was governor of Shanxi.Biography ==References== Category:1933 births Category:People's Republic of China politicians from Zhejiang Category:Communist Party of China politicians from Zhejiang Category:Governors of Shanxi Category:Living people
title: Wang Senhao
